A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Hands down the worst Star Wars movie. Whatever Rian Johnson was thinking when he made this movie is beyond disturbing. He needs a few lessons in common sense of how space works. Bombing runs straight out of WW2 movies\, but in space? There's no gravity in space. Blaster cannons affected by gravity? in space? Absolutely terrible.

The whole casino planet? Remove that from the movie and you lose nothing importing to do with the plot. You can literally cut 80% of the scenes out of this movie and still lose no plot important scenes.

If Rian Johnson is ever allowed to touch Star Wars again\, it'll be Disney biggest mistake since not bringing George Lucas in when they started making the trilogy.
